src:
Menang Liga Europa adalah Prioritas Manchester United
07 Nov 2019, 17:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manajer Manchester United, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer membantah anggapan bahwa timnya tidak akan serius di Liga Europa musim ini. Solskjaer menyebut bahwa timnya cukup berambisi untuk memenangkan Liga Europa musim ini.
Musim ini Manchester United harus berjibaku di ajang Liga Europa. Hal ini dikarenakan musim lalu, Setan Merah hanya mampu finish di peringkat enam klasemen akhir EPL sehingga mereka gagal menembus Liga Champions.
Banyak yang menyarankan agar United lebih fokus di Premier League ketimbang di Liga Europa. Maklum, jadwal EPL dan Liga Europa selalu mepet, sehingga akan sulit bagi United untuk memainkan pemain-pemain terbaiknya di dua kompetisi tersebut.
Namun Solskjaer menegaskan bahwa timnya tidak akan pernah menomorduakan Liga Europa. "Tidak, kami tidak akan menganggap kompetisi ini nomor dua," beber Solskjaer kepada MUTV.

Baca komentar lengkap sang pelatih di bawah ini.
text:
Winning the Europa League is Manchester United's priority
Nov 7 2019, 17:00 by Bola.net
Soccer - Manchester United manager Ole Gunnar Solskjaer has denied the notion that his team will not be serious in the Europa League this season. Solskjaer said that his team was ambitious enough to win the Europa League this season.
This season Manchester United have struggled in the Europa League. This is because last season, the Red Devils were only able to finish sixth in the final EPL standings so they failed to penetrate the Champions League.
Many have suggested that United focus more on the Premier League than on the Europa League. Understandably, the EPL schedule and the Europa League are always tight, so it will be difficult for United to play their best players in the two competitions.
But Solskjaer insists that his team will never come second in the Europa League. "No, we will not consider this competition number two," Solskjaer told MUTV.
